attributes.action: Too stop discrimination to Asian-British people and fund to help low businesses
attributes.additional_details: Because it is not fair on Asian people its not there fault covid-19 happened. Especially a asian student in the UK for example. He had nothing to do with it so should not be attacked and then left with mental scars.
attributes.background: To fund for health services for victims of covid-19 attacks and to help out more with Asian-British businesses. As due to hate attacks they are also losing customers therefore losing money. Also sanction harsher fines and sentences for attacks like these.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
